channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Marine Corps ‘On Track’ To Hit 2025 Recruiting Targets, Official Says
item.description: Signaling another prospective win for the new Trump administration, the U.S. Marine Corps is on pace to hit its fiscal year 2025 recruiting goals, The...

item.title: U.K. PM Keir Starmer gets in the line of foreign leaders wanting a meeting with Trump
item.description: President Trump said Friday he had a phone call with British Prime Minister Keir Starmer on Thursday and could meet with him as early as next week.

item.title: DOGE says it dug up another $1.9 billion in taxpayer money 'misplaced' by Biden admin
item.description: The Department of Government Efficient on Friday said it continues to find wasteful spending across the federal government.

item.title: Trump gives thumbs-up to J.D. Vance's remarks scolding European leaders
item.description: President Trump on Friday applauded his vice president's speech in Munich warning of the erosion of freedom of speech and other core values in Europe.

item.title: Grounded: White House expands Associated Press ban to Air Force One

item.title: Buffett sold more BofA stock while keeping Apple stake intact
item.description: Berkshire Hathaway cut its stake in the bank to 8.9% in the fourth quarter after selling 117.5 million shares.

item.title: Trump establishes a new council to advance U.S. energy dominance
item.description: President Trump signed an executive order Friday establishing the National Energy Dominance Council.

item.title: From legal settlements to business ventures, mega corporations are making deals with President Donald Trump and the Trump family
item.description: Companies have reportedly doled out $80 million to the Trump family and his presidential library, according to the Wall Street Journal.

item.title: J.D. Vance Warns Europe That Its Greatest Threat Comes ‘From Within’
item.description: Vice President J.D. Vance warned European leaders in Munich the greatest challenges threatening democracy today are from within.

item.title: 2025 Wealth Management Outlook: Spotlight on Investment Careers
item.description: As family offices continue to expand, those who understand their complexities will be well-positioned to lead the next era of wealth management.

item.description: Real assets' first test in modern times started in 2021. Did they perform as hoped?
